about_the_game:
Angira Online is a survival and building game set in a fantasy Norse world. Players take on the role of a explorer who has been sent to the realm of Angira, tasked with defeating the unknowns of the world abound and building a settlement to claim it. One of the key features of the game is the ability to build and customize boats, which players use to explore the various oceans and fjords in the game world. The game also features a crafting system, allowing players to create weapons, armor, and tools to aid them in combat and exploration.

Players must gather resources, such as wood and stone, to build their settlement and craft items. They must also hunt for food and fend off hostile creatures, such as wolves and unfriendly players. As players progress, they will encounter and defeat powerful enemies, be it players or whatever lurks in the forest, each with their own unique abilities and skills. The game is massively online, persistent, and an ever bourgeoning world filled with plenty to explore.

Angira Online also has a lot of exploration element, as players can discover different biomes such as meadows, swamps, mountains, and the deep sea. Each biome has its own unique resources and creatures, and players will need to adapt their strategies and equipment accordingly. The game also has a day and night cycle and different weather conditions, adding an extra layer of realism and challenge to the gameplay.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 10th Gen i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1070 or equivalent
